verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: On Thursday] [ARG0: White House staffers] [V: brought] [ARG1: their children] [ARG2: to work for National Take Our Daughters and Sons to Work Day ( a.k.a . Take Your Kid to Work Day )] . The kids were in the Oval Office with Donald Trump and briefing room with Sarah Huckabee Sanders .

On Thursday White House staffers brought their children to work for [ARG1: National] [V: Take] [ARG0: Our Daughters and Sons] to Work Day ( a.k.a . Take Your Kid to Work Day ) . The kids were in the Oval Office with Donald Trump and briefing room with Sarah Huckabee Sanders .
